com.opera.core.systems.scope.services

Interface Selftest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScopeSelftest

    public interface Selftest
extends Service
    Runs Opera's selftests through Scope. This is only compatible with Opera versions with core-integration-394 and higher.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Selftest.RunStatus 
      static interface  Selftest.SelftestResult
      Represents a single result from a selftest.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addResult

        void addResult(com.opera.core.systems.scope.protos.SelftestProtos.SelftestResult message)
        Add a new selftest result to the internal cache kept in Operadriver#selftest

      • runSelftests

        Selftest.RunStatus runSelftests(Set<String> modules,
                              String groups,
                              String excludes)
        Run the selftests for the specified modules. Optionally you can limit the tests to be run by a group pattern and an exclude pattern.
        Parameters:
        modules - module names
        groups - group names or pattern
        excludes - pattern of groups or modules that should be excluded from testing
        Returns:
        Selftest.RunStatus.RUNNING if tests are running, or Selftest.RunStatus.NOT_AVAILABLE if no tests matching the selection pattern are found
        Since:
        2.0

      • getAvailableGroups

        Map<String,List<String>> getAvailableGroups()
        Retrieves a list of available groups.
        Returns:
        map of modules and the test groups it contains
        Since:
        2.0

      • onSelftestResult

        void onSelftestResult(ServiceCallback<com.opera.core.systems.scope.protos.SelftestProtos.SelftestResult> callback)
        Specify a callback for when a selftest result is received.
        Parameters:
        callback - will be called on every selftest result that is received
        Since:
        2.0
